coverLetter:

I was recently informed about a open job position. After inquiring about the job description I am confident that I am perfect for the position as my experience and abilities precisely match your requirements.

I have 6years in retail management experience at a high volume corporate store by the name of G by Guess (assistant manager), Co-Manager (Store manager in training) at Forever 21, Floating Area manager with the company Shoe Palace & currently at a family owned business by the name of GsLove. 

I have the ability to plan and organize on a daily basis, and posseâ€™s extensive knowledge of the retail industry. I have an obsessive focus on customers that means I can keep delivering new idea, new looks and new reasons for them to keep coming back. All of this coupled with my proven ability to drive sales, motivate and encourage the sales team, continuous tracking of sales and achieving daily sales goals. I thank you for your time and look forward to hearing from you

Eduardo Bautista
